tool_description: Flexpa is a digital health API that allows patients and health plan members to access, manage, and provision access to their medical records. Whilst Rapid's 'Endpoints' tab shows a preview of the Flexpa API, the API is only fully usable once your app is authenticated. To get started and authenticate your app, read the Flexpa developer docs at: https://www.flexpa.com/docs
name: Flexpa
title: Flexpa

api_list.name: CareTeam
AllergyIntolerance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flexpa.p.rapidapi.com/fhir/AllergyIntolerance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flexpa.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
